attributes.action: Convince Boris Johnson to re-enter the leadership race
attributes.additional_details: Boris was a great mayor of London and lead the  leave campaign strongly, I strongly believe that he should re-enter the race and lead our beautiful country with all the strength and character we need.
attributes.background: Former London mayor Boris Johnson has stepped down from the leadership race because Michael Gove Decieved him. I believe that the country deserves a strong, charismatic leader such as Boris and that he should re-enter the race and give the people what they deserve!
